Activity: Log in to the OA system and check emails for any updates from QA testers about scheduled testing.
Attend the testing session with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2, observing and assisting as needed.
Address any issues identified during the testing session in collaboration with QA testers.
Modify the EHR functionalities based on the feedback received during testing.
Conduct regression testing on the modified features to ensure stability and performance.
Document issues encountered and solutions derived from testing and code modifications.
